headline: Why is Workday (WDAY) One of the Most Promising Future Stocks to Buy Now?
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) is one of the most promising future stocks to buy now. Evercore ISI maintained a Buy rating on ​Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) on February 5, setting a price target of $300. In a separate development, ​Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) announced the Military Skills Mapper, a new feature in Workday Recruiting, on February 3, which […]
